description_for_human: Personal portfolio website showcasing work and expertise of Ignas Mikolaitis, a full-stack developer and AI engineer.
description_for_model: This is the portfolio website of Ignas Mikolaitis, a full-stack developer and AI engineer. The site contains information about professional experience, technical skills, featured projects, achievements, and contact information. Ignas specializes in React, Next.js, Python, JavaScript, machine learning, and modern web development technologies.

ai_crawling.purpose: Educational and informational use, to help AI understand professional background and work
ai_crawling.restrictions: Please respect copyright and provide attribution when referencing this content
